title: LF some flex games (placed into silver 5)

embed.description: ElitestNoob / Gold 1 100LP / 89W 37L Win Ratio 71% / Twitch - 28W 4L Win Ratio 88%, Lucian - 14W 6L Win Ratio 70%, Caitlyn - 6W 6L Win Ratio 50%, Ashe - 8W 1L Win Ratio 89%, Malzahar - 6W 2L Win Ratio 75%

body:
No, im not technically smurfing since im hardstuck plat garbage on all accounts.
ADC/MID/SUPP/TOP in that order.
Don't add me if you're just going to tilt ragequit after one bad game please.
Off meta one tricks make me {{item:3070}} 
Not really a shotcaller but be open to advice/suggestions if you want to play.

Really don't care about elo, just trying to make this game fun again.
Again, silver 5 flex, will take duo/trio/5 man flex..not looking for solo/duo

replies.body: Bump. Might actually go back to supp main but lacking champs (supp, adc, mid)
